extendedInfo.description: If you love videogames that is your applicattion.The best app to stay up to date with everything related to videogames.VideoGames News is a news reader that have more than 50 feeds. You will be informed in all moment what happen. And the best is that is a very simple application.It has news from all platforms like PS3, Xbox, PS4, Wii, Wii U, PC, 3DS, DS, PSP, PSVita and more.More than 50 rss feeds together!!"ActionTrip", "Analog Addiction", "Andriasang", "Blues News", "Den Of Geek", "Dark Side Of Gaming", "Edge Online", "EGMNow", "ElectroPixel", "Epic Slash", "EuroGamer", "Fraggednation", "G4", "GamaSutra","GameInformer", "Game News HQ", "Game Rant", "GamesIndustry", "GameSpot", GamesRadar","GamingBolt", "GenGAME", "Giant Bomb", "God Is A Geek", "Grand Theef Auto", "IGN","Indie Gamer Reviewer", "Joystiq", "Kotaku", "Magic Box", "Major Nelson","Masonic Gamer", "Massively", "Metacritic", "MMO Reporter", "MMORPG", "MOG Nation","My Nintendo News", "N4G", "Nintendo USA", "Nintendo Life","Nintendo Official Magazine", "Operation Sports", "Official Xbox Magazine", "Pc Gamer","Player Attack", "PlayStation Magazine", "PlayStation Blog", "PlayStation Lifestyle","PS3 Hax", "PSX Extreme", "Push Start Select", "Revision3 Games", "Rock Paper Shotgun","RPGamer", "Shacknews", "Siliconera", "Slash Gear", "Strategy Informer","This Is My Joystick!", "Touch Arcade", "TrueArchievements", "1Up", "VG24/7","VGChartz", "VGLeaks", "Video Games Unconvered", "VideoGamer", "Xbox360Archievements" and growing!You could be send me email if you think missing any webpage.Enjoy it!

reviews.title: Where can I buy?
reviews.comment: Great app does everything I wanted. Needs an AD free version. I\'d pay a dollar or two for no ads. I\'ve never said that about phone apps.
reviews.author: James Brune

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app!! Its gets news from all gaming sites fast and easy
reviews.author: sakima davis

reviews.title: Cool App
reviews.comment: I like how it links me to so many gaming blogs. Very interesting.
reviews.author: Luigi Cipriani
